post_info.post_title: LOTR and HP (fav and least fav characters)

I'll have you know that this is not easy to do. Especially for Harry Potter for some reason. All of my favs are very close, so I'll just pick he ones that barely edge out on top.
 
 HP Movie: Hermione, Dumbeldore, and Snape (Alan Rickman really brings Snape to life
 HP Book: Harry, Hermione, and Dumbeldore
 (Ron is very close though)
 
 LOTR Movie: Sam and Gandalf
 LOTR Book: Sam (He's the real hero :) )
 
 I couldn't really say that I have least favorite characters. There are of course characters you don't like while you are reading because they are villains, but there aren't any that I find to be poorly written.
